id: Enter the id of the banner you want to check:
repeat_error:
Incorrect value in settings! 
The valid values are: ask, no, yes
repeat_error2:
Incorrect value! 
The valid values are: no, yes
repeat: Do you want your pity refreshed automatically (yes, no)?
repeat_w:
IMPORTANT: GENSHIN API WILL NOT UPDATE YOUR WISCHES IMMEDIATELY IT MAY TAKE FROM 30 MINUTES UP TO EVEN 2 HOURS, SO IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED. 
ALSO, IMPORTANT TO ADD, SOMETIME AUTOMATIC CHECKING MAY TURN OFF FOR SOME UNKNOWN REASON TO ME
auth_timeout:
Authkey expired! 
Refresh it by opening wish history page in Genshin
quit: By typing "quit" you can turn off application
